Jay Phillips developed the ‘superators’ gem, which enables the use of custom operators in Ruby. for example.

  1. require ‘rubygems’  
  2. require ‘superators’  
  3.   
  4. class Array  
  5.   superator “<—-” do |operand|  
  6.     self << operand.reverse  
  7.   end  
  8. end  
  9.   
  10. [“jay”] <—- “spillihp”
